style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#0000FF;entryX=1;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-87" target="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-88" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="0.2899999999999068" y="450.0000000000001" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-258.00000000000006" y="499.59000000000003" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-70" value="HTTP 200 OK<br><br>{"accessToken": "${accessToken}",<br>"refreshToken":"${refreshToken}",<br>"email": "${email}",<br>"name": "${name}"}" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="420" width="230" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-72" value="Access token의 유효성 판단.<br>토큰에 이상이 있을 경우, 헤더필드에JwtException 을 추가하여 응답" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="105" y="80" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-73" value="응답 헤더를 통해 <br>Access token의 만료 확인.<br>&nbsp;Refresh token을 요청 바디에 포함하여 Access token 재발급 요청" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-505" y="152" width="220" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-76" value="Access token을 요청 헤더의&nbsp;<br>Authorization&nbsp;필드에 추가하여 요청" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-505" y="26" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-50" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#000000;entryX=0;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-76" target="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-72" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-56" y="40" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-10" y="40" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-79" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#FF0000;" parent="1" source="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-72" target="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-73" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="10" y="98" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-50" y="92.5" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-80" value="HTTP&nbsp;&nbsp;401 Unauthorize<br style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px;"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">JwtException: EXPIRED_ACCESS_TOKEN</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="102" width="230" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-81" value="Refresh token의 유효성 판단.<br>토큰에 이상이 있을 경우, 헤더필드에JwtException 을 추가하여 응답" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="105" y="230" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-82" value="응답 헤더를 통해&nbsp;<br>Refresh token의 만료 확인. <br>로그인 요청" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-505" y="315" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-83" value="PUT /auth<br><br style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px;"><span style="font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">{"refreshToken": "${refreshToken}"}</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="172" width="230" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-85" value="HTTP&nbsp;&nbsp;401 Unauthorize<br style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px;"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">JwtException: EXPIRED_REFRESH_TOKEN</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="250" width="230" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-86" value="HTTP&nbsp;&nbsp;POST /auth<br><br style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px;"><span style="font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">{"email": "${email}",</span><br style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px;"><span style="font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">password:"${password}"}</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="327" width="230" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-87" value="사용자 정보 확인 후,&nbsp;<br>Access token 및 Refresh token 재발행" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="105" y="380" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-88" value="재발행된 Access token과 <br>Refresh token을 저장" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-505" y="460" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9PrZGpe4Rwtgz1YyTgy-71" value="&nbsp;GET<span style="font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">&nbsp;/members<br></span><br style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 11px;"><span style="font-size: 11px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Authrization: "Bearer ${accessToken}"&nbsp;</span>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-210" y="26" width="230" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X-g4Kq4Wnt7qXZijM-FN-4" value="<h2 style="border-color: var(--border-color); box-sizing: inherit; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 24px; font-weight: normal; div.div:
Access token의 유효성 판단.
토큰에 이상이 있을 경우, 헤더필드에JwtException 을 추가하여 응답

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 257px; margin-left: 86px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
응답 헤더를 통해
Access token의 만료 확인.
Refresh token을 요청 바디에 포함하여 Access token 재발급 요청

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 121px; margin-left: 86px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Access token을 요청 헤더의
Authorization 필드에 추가하여 요청

div.div:
Refresh token의 유효성 판단.
토큰에 이상이 있을 경우, 헤더필드에JwtException 을 추가하여 응답

div.div:
응답 헤더를 통해
Refresh token의 만료 확인.

div.div:
사용자 정보 확인 후,
Access token 및 Refresh token 재발행

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 555px; margin-left: 86px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
재발행된 Access token과
Refresh token을 저장
